name: eatio-fullstack
description: Full-stack food delivery application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix eatio-backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev --prefix eatio-backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start --prefix eatio-backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo âœ… Setup complete! Run 'npm run dev' to start development
